entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:34 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:34 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:34 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
